job_details.Vacaturetitel: Part-time Systems Developer - AI Trainer (Dutch) - Remote
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?

   We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.

   About the opportunity:
     * Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
     * This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you

   You may contribute your expertise by
     * Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
     * Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models, * Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs. For non-core work, such as during initial project onboarding or project overtime phases, lower rates may apply. Certain projects offer incentive payments. Please review the payment terms for each project.
job_details.full_text:
Part-time Systems Developer - AI Trainer (Dutch) - Remote

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?

   We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.

   About the opportunity:
     * Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
     * This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you

   You may contribute your expertise by
     * Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
     * Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models, * Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs. For non-core work, such as during initial project onboarding or project overtime phases, lower rates may apply. Certain projects offer incentive payments. Please review the payment terms for each project.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on providing human feedback to train AI models by crafting questions and evaluating code, rather than developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models. It lacks the core technical responsibilities associated with ML or GenAI engineering roles.

phrases: Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the company's business model and how it helps other companies improve their AI, indicating an understanding of the business context for AI services.

phrases: help train generative artificial intelligence models
engaging with these models as they learn to code
Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the process of training and evaluating AI models, specifically generative AI and large language models, by providing feedback and data.
The description explicitly seeks individuals with software engineering and coding expertise, implying the use of these skills in the context of training AI models, particularly for code generation.

phrases: There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates that the role is open to individuals without prior AI experience, suggesting a willingness to learn and adapt to new AI concepts and tools.

phrases: Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems
soft_skills.justification: The mention of 'discrete, highly variable problems' suggests that the role involves analyzing and addressing unique challenges in training AI models.

The role requires individuals to actively contribute their coding expertise and take initiative in crafting questions and evaluating AI-generated code, demonstrating ownership over their contribution to the training process.
